mapper.insert: insert into member(name, id, pw, semester, dept, toeic) values (#{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{semester}, #{dept}, 'X')
mapper.update: update member set semester = #{semester}, toeic = #{toeic} where id = 2022000000
mapper.select: select sum(credits) from user_class where id = 2022000000
select (common + must_major + sel_major + normal + basic + english) as total from dept_info where years = #{years} and dept = #{dept}
mapper.insert: insert into user_class(id, dept, field, class_name, credits, english, semester) values (#{id}, #{dept}, #{field}, #{class_name}, #{credits}, #{english}, #{semester})
mapper.select: select field, sum(credits) from class_table group by field having semester = 2 and dept = 'test';
